articles.title: Airfare for India bound flights from UAE likely to double during July and August
articles.description: According to a report by Khaleej Times, airfares from the UAE to the Indian subcontinent are anticipated to quadruple in July and August, as demand for travel surges during the summer vacations, when many expat families visit India.

After a two-year slew due to strong Covid-19 norms which curbed travel, now loosening of Covid norms is likely to boost travel to India from the UAE.
